translated: Chapter 1 of the Record of Distinguishing the False
Åšramaá¹‡a of Yundeng Chan Temple on Mount Dao, Yuan
Compiled by Xiangmai, the Imperial Historian, by imperial order
I have heard that when the Dharma King rules the world, he promotes the right path to benefit the times.
When the enlightened ruler presides over the court, he elucidates the imperial principles to save beings.
He cuts off the false and supports the correct, extols virtue and distinguishes delusions.
Therefore, when Yao executed the four evildoers, the eight directions were at peace.
When the Buddha descended to the six realms, the five regions returned their hearts to him.
This is all in order to
correct chaos, rescue from burning, and enlighten the ears and eyes.
As for our Buddha, he accomplished his merits in past eons.
He descended to the world to benefit beings.
Though unborn, he manifested birth.
He benefited the lands of the trichiliocosm.
Though formless, he manifested form.
He suddenly transformed the lands of the billion worlds.ğŸ”½It is like the bright moon shining in the sky, universally responding to the myriad streams.
It is like the long wind blowing, and the myriad sounds are heard.
He guides the deluded child to the supreme vehicle.
He leads the lost path to the eightfold path.
He uproots the heat and suffering of the five turbidities.
Removing the cage of the four inverted views.
Pointing to the bright pearl under the robe.
Unfolding the sutra scroll within the dust.
Defeating the demon army under the Bodhi tree.
Not descending from the imperial court.
Overthrowing the non-Buddhist teachings at the Golden River.
Extending the campaign to the farthest reaches.
Grace flowing to the myriad nations.
Benefiting the four forms of birth.
Compassionate clouds shade the heavens above the peak of existence.
The Dharma rain moistens the realm beyond bounds.
When sentient beings no longer feel the Great Sage's return to truth,
The sagely and wise continue his radiance, upholding the profound model.
Then there were AÅ›vaghoá¹£a and NÄgÄrjuna, who expanded the web of teachings in the Western Heavens.
NÄgÄrjuna and RÄhula established the Dharma banner in South India.
Vasubandhu was renowned for his virtue of whipping corpses.
Saá¹ƒghabhadra displayed the marvel of roaring at a rock.
Subduing the non-Buddhist teachings in one era.
Spreading his fine reputation for ten thousand years.
Then the golden visage dreamed of in the East, and the jade horse came from the West.
KÄÅ›yapa-MÄtanga revealed the correct teachings in Luoyang.
All Daoist scriptures were burned.
Saá¹ƒghadeva refuted heterodoxy within the Pass.
The brahmin was speechless.
Hanging the sun of the Buddha in the dark path,
Fanning the wind of compassion throughout the world.
The talented and outstanding followed suit, the outstanding and virtuous linked their fragrance.
Therefore, there was the great leader, the Dharma master Fashang, who was very capable.
He defeated Jiang Bin at the Wei court.
Falin was knowledgeable.
He refuted Fu Yi at the Tang court.
His great virtue was praised in his time.
His good reputation shook the world.
But as the sage passed away and the years went by, demons and falsehoods approached the truth.
Purple and real were confused with vermilion, and jade was often mixed with stone.
If it were not for the highest wisdom, who could examine and clarify it?
Therefore, the rat-jade was indiscriminately named.
The people of Zhou considered it as valuable as gold.
The chicken and phoenix had different appearances.
The people of Chu were confused about right and wrong.
Therefore, there were those who adhered to the text and deviated from the truth.
They rejected it as heretical teachings.
Clever words and deviant paths.
They drew it as their own discourse.
Although the ultimate truth does not harm a single hair,
False teachings have dust in the eyes and ears.
This is why it is easy to fall into the dark paths.
This is why it is difficult to enter the gate of sages.
When our Yuan dynasty ruled the world,
Auspiciousness coincided with the golden wheel, and auspicious talismans with the jade calendar.
It covered the six directions with light and peace.
It unified the myriad countries and extended its rule.
In the east, it reached as far as the peach trees, in the west, it ended at the willow trees.
In the south, it moved the golden tripod, in the north, it reached the jade measuring instrument.
Since the time of Zun Lu He Xu, and after the Qin, Han, Sui, and Tang dynasties,
There has never been a prosperity like that of the present court.
The great ancestor and great sovereign issued clear edicts to support and protect.
The Yuan emperor and Ming emperor donated gold and treasures to cultivate and revere.
They all thought of the mind of entrustment.
They all looked up to the teachings of compassion and mercy.
They exempted them from taxes and service, and extended the transforming and enlightening wind.
The present emperor.
Deeply benevolent and wise, embodying the way and being broad and bright.
Bearing the heroic foundation of the four sages.
Continuing the great valor of the hundred kings.
In his spare moments from the myriad affairs, he pays attention to the Buddhist gate.
Reciting the golden texts of hundreds of thousands of scriptures.
Extending the great assembly of tens of thousands of monks.
Cultivating blessings in the garden of enlightenment and constructing monasteries.ğŸ”½The government values kindness and benevolence, benefiting the common people.
Investigating the humble and promoting the wise and foolish.
Understanding the shallowness and depth of Buddhism and Daoism.
Comprehending the superiority and inferiority of the deviant and correct.
The Daoists are ignorant and despise the state.
Deceiving with their dwelling in the northern region.
Letting loose their private opinions and arguments.
Qiu Chujun falsely speaks and flatters the emperor.
Li Zhichang deceives and flatters the times.
Gathering the criminal servants who hide their duties.
Collecting the false scriptures that exclude Buddhism.
Linghu Zhang first compiled the false teachings.
Shi Zhijing further expanded the deviant texts.
Imitating the eighty-two stupas of the Tathagata.
Collecting the eighty-one transformations of Laozi.
Not distinguishing ancient and modern, not understanding the classics and histories.
Stealing Buddhist scriptures and collecting them as Daoist teachings.ğŸ”½Selecting the auspicious signs of Buddhism as the auspicious signs of Laozi.
Changing surnames to An, changing names to Lao Xiang, and making it Lao Xiang.
Presumptuously taking it as his own virtue.
Falsity born from falsity.
Emptiness built upon emptiness.
Claiming that Lao Dan was born before the void.
Bowing to the Buddha's descent during the reign of King Zhuang of Zhou.
Establishing biographies, images, and circulating them.
Allowing Yin Xi to become the Buddha.
Venerating Lao Dan as the ancestor of Shakyamuni.
Fu Xi bestowing teachings.
Elevating Bo Yang to be the teacher of Emperor Yu.
Emperor Xuanyuan asking about the Way from Guang Cheng.
Considering it to be Laozi.
King Wen taking Lu Wang as his teacher.
Tying it to Laojun.
Duke Zhou bowing at the front of the bed to Laozi, who taught him the Xuan Ji Jing. Confucius asking about rituals under the seat, destroying the three teachings and uniquely manifesting.
Surpassing the thousand sages and being revered.
Solitary and lofty before the five periods.
Being the teacher after the hundred generations.
Who else is the sole sage in the realm?
There are a hundred skillful adornments, but not a single truth.
If one examines this diagram,
The intention is to eliminate the hundred schools and exclusively establish one sect.
Covering up the sage deeds of Emperor Yu and Emperor Shun,
Destroying the great model of Buddhism and Confucianism.
The great evil and treachery, the world does not know.
Although there was the chaos of the end of the Xia dynasty,
And Wang Mang's deception of the Han court,
It is not enough to surpass this.
If it were not for the bright sage above, who clearly sees without delusion,
Who could discern the true and false, and recognize right and wrong with their own eyes?
Therefore, a clear edict was specially issued to distinguish the true and false.
The evil tree of ten thousand years was uprooted in one day.
There is the master of the canon, the Shaolin abbot,
The pillar and foundation of the ancestral court, the beam of the Buddhist temple.
His mind is straightforward and impartial,
His nature is deep and vast like a vast and clear ocean.
He pities the ignorant and deluded, and guides those who are confused and confined.
Sweeping away the evil and ominous from the long sky,
Raising the Buddha's sun to shine brightly.
Xiang Mai has heard this discussion and cannot help but speak out.
Praising the divine sagacity of the sage ruler.
Admiring the elegant responses of Shaolin.ğŸ”½Simply relying on the orthodox scriptures to refute the mad talk.
Blocking the root source of false teachings.
Overturning the forest and wilderness of the mountain of heresy.
Causing the Jade Emperor of the Great Void to be startled in the nine heavens.
The Primordial Beginning Heavenly Venerable to lose his courage above the Three Purities.ğŸ”½The Lord of the Ten Thousand Heavens to be ashamed and unable to respond.
The Nine Mansion Cave Immortals to be embarrassed and have nowhere to go.
Moreover, listing several items, taking one as an example for the rest.
Allowing gold and brass to have different colors, and the Jing and Wei rivers to flow separately.
Pouring jade liquid into the intestines.
Causing the deluded saliva to disperse.
Scraping the cataracts with a golden knife.
Allowing the eye of wisdom to be clear.ğŸ”½Being the night light for the dark room.
Being the dawn mirror for the secluded road.
The enlightened ones know this way.
In the second year of the Zhiyuan era, in the year of Zhanmeng, the dragon gathered, the stars recorded, and the Yangfu month.
The writing was completed at the Wan Shou Lan Ruo.
1. Falsely Establishing the Heavenly Venerable, the First Transformation, it is said:
The Way is the parent of myriad transformations,
The ultimate honor of spontaneity.
Within this profound and subtle, it gives birth to emptiness and vastness.
Emptiness and vastness are the true one.
After the qi of the true one transforms and gives birth,
It passes through 9,990,000,000,990,000 years.
It then transforms and gives birth to the upper three qi.
The three qi are separated by 9,990,000,000,990,000 years.
The three combine to form virtue, together giving birth to the unsurpassed.
It is then the Heavenly Venerable of the Void Emperor.
Again, passing through the above number of years,
It gives birth to the middle three qi.
The three combine to form virtue, giving birth to Xuan Lao.
It is then the Heavenly Venerable of the Primordial Beginning.
Again, passing through the above number of years,
It gives birth to the lower three qi.
The three combine to form virtue, together giving birth to the Most High.
It is then the Lord of the Way of the Most High.
After this, one qi again gives birth to three qi.
Each qi is separated by 810,000,000,000 and 810,000 years.
The three combined to give birth to Laozi.
Although the four sages are born in succession, they do not depend on each other.
This is called solitary transformation.
After Laozi was born, he gave birth to the Five Periods.
They are called Great Simplicity, Great Beginning, Great Commencement, Great Primordial, and Great Ultimate.
The fifth transformation says:
Laozi is the ancestor of the primordial chaos.
He is the parent of Heaven and Earth.
Therefore, he can distribute clarity and turbidity, and open up the universe.
The critique says:ğŸ”½I have heard of the dragon-patterned and bird-seal script,
The tortoise-script and Dipper-script classics,ğŸ”½The records on jade tablets and jade slips,
The books in golden boxes and golden coffers.
The chapters of Qin, Han, Wei, and Jin,
The concise records of Song, Qi, Liang, and Chen.
The records of events and history, written in a straightforward manner,
Nowhere do I see the name of the Divine Emperor,
Nor have I heard of the title of the Primordial Beginning.ğŸ”½How could there be someone holding a jade tablet in hand,
With a body draped in yellow robes,
With white hair hanging down.
Wearing a golden crown on the head.
Also called Tianzun (Celestial Venerable).
Sitting high above the Three Clarities.
Solely claiming to be the teacher.
Governing the palace of the Nine Flowers.
Even with the name of Tianzun.
It is all stealing the Buddha's words.
Ancient scriptures call the Buddha Tianzun.
It has nothing to do with the Daoist Lord.
Stealing others' beautiful titles and arrogantly exalting oneself.
Trying to gain the trust of the common people, this statement is wrong.
According to the Liezi and the Yigouming Jue,
Before Heaven and Earth were born, there was Taiyi (Great Simplicity).ğŸ”½There was Taiwu (Great Commencement).
There was Taishi (Great Beginning).ğŸ”½There was Taisu (Great Primordial).
There was Taiji (Great Ultimate).
The commentators all say:
Taiyi is when qi has not yet been seen.ğŸ”½Taiwu is the beginning of qi.ğŸ”½Taishi is the beginning of form.
Taisu is the beginning of substance.
Taiji is when substance and form are already present but the chaos has not yet separated.
After the Great Ultimate, the two polarities were born.
They are called Heaven and Earth.ğŸ”½Names arise from reality.ğŸ”½Reality arises from names.
When names and reality are established,
the Way is then practiced.ğŸ”½Before the Great Ultimate, it was vast and empty.
It was dark and vague, originally devoid of sound and form.
How can one falsely extend
the nine breaths and arbitrarily create four people?
The void gives birth to the void.
It is like striking emptiness to seek sound.
Falsity arises from falsity.
It is like chasing a shadow to seek traces.
How can one not think?ğŸ”½Once a name is established, it must have a substance.
Once a substance is established, it must have a clan.
But who gave birth to the Primordial Beginning of the Void Emperor?
Where does his clan originate and where does he reside?
If there is a source, in which book does it appear?
If there is no origin, it is a false fabrication.
Moreover, before the emptiness, there were originally no years.
Now marking years only shows more falsehood.
The counting of years began with Fuxi.
The Yellow Emperor proclaimed it in the Jiazi year.
How many inversions are there in recording the present and the past?
Moreover, are the Three Venerables above embodied or formless?
If they are embodied,
they are not above the Great Simplicity.
They are born from parents.
They must have a year, month, day, place, surname, and personal name.
The previous text says that the Three Qi were born together with virtue.
Then it is using qi to give birth to qi.
It is no different from qi.
How can there be form and name?
If they are formless,
below the seventh transformation it says:
Laojun, on the second day of the ninth month of the first year of the Shanghuang era, went out to the West River.
He encountered the Primordial Beginning Heavenly Venerable riding a jade carriage with eight scenic views and driving a nine-colored mysterious dragon.
A group of immortals led the way, holding flower banners in their hands.
The lion and white crane howled and sang.
They met together above the West River.
The Heavenly Venerable bestowed on Laojun the Mysterious Cavern Jade Talisman.
Who is this?
Whether advancing or retreating, both seeking, there is no standard.
Then you know that the sea dates are empty talk, with a name but no reality.
Carving ice and engraving snow, in vain wasting words and chapters.
Not included by the mountains and seas.
Not recorded in the Great Wilderness.
The clever adornments of the ignorant are not worth believing.
Laojun was a pillar official of the declining Zhou dynasty.
He falsely claims to be the ancestor of the primordial chaos.
Avoiding the chaos of the Zhou, he passed through the Hangu Pass.
He falsely claims to be the parents of heaven and earth.
Since his own words contradict each other,
How can the letters be attacked?
Covering one's ears while stealing a bell, wanting to hide it only reveals it more.
The chapter on virtue and morality says:
I have three treasures.
Treasure them and hold onto them.
One is kindness.
Two is frugality.
Three is not daring to be the first in the world.
Laojun offered his wife and children to the king of the Hu people, and fought with the Hu army.
How can there be kindness?
Riding a jade-balanced carriage, sitting inside the golden enclosure.
Wearing the nine-colored Li Luo robe.
The nine coverings are like the canopy of an inverted crane.
How can there be frugality?
Born from the beginningless, arising from the causeless,
It is the forerunner of myriad paths.
It is the ancestor of primordial qi.
Observing the undiscerned chaos, seeing the undifferentiated clarity and turbidity,
It is the teacher of emperors.
It is the mother of heaven and earth.
How can there be anything it does not dare to be foremost in the world?
Gao Xian, styled Zhong Chang, of Liaoyang,
Visited the White Crane Monastery in Dongjing,
And saw the images of the Three Purities.
He pointed to the right one and said,
What is this image?
The abbot replied,
It is the image of Laojun.
He asked, In which dynasty was he?
The abbot replied, During the reign of King Ding of Zhou.
He then pointed to the left one and said,
What is this image?
The abbot said,
It is the image of Daojun.
He asked, In which dynasty was he?
The abbot was taken aback and did not answer.
Gao Xian pointed to the central image and said,
Even if it is the Venerable Primordial Beginning of Heaven,
Those who heard this passed it on as a joke.
2. The False Establishment of the Kalpa and Year Names, Part 2 and 3, the Third Transformation, it is said:
It began with the qi of the great void.
That qi strikes each other, coming and going in disorder.
After hundreds of millions of qi,
that qi gradually comes and goes, flowing.
It is called the qi of nature, stealing the Buddha's scriptures, the matter of the wind wheel spinning below when the world first forms, and it is also called the qi of Mi Luo and Wan Brahma.
Again, after 99,999,900,000 qi,
it forms the qi of auspiciousness.
It becomes one sage.
He calls himself the Heavenly King of Primordial Commencement.
At the same time, the Five Elders, the lords of the Five Phases, are born. The kalpa is called Yan Kang.
The year is called Long Han.
Again, after the above number of qi,
the Lord of the Way is born. The kalpa is called Chi Ming.
The year is also called Chi Ming.
At the same time, the Nine Elders are born.
They are divided into the Nine Heavens.
Again, after the above number of qi,
The Lord Lao was born.ğŸ”½The eon was called Qingyun.
The year was called Shanghuang.
At that time, the Eight Elders were born.
They also established the Five Periods: Taiyi, Taiji, and so on.
The Lord Lao then formed the Primordial Beginning with the two energies of yin and yang.
And distributed the myriad things of heaven and earth, beginning to be complete.
Bian said:ğŸ”½I have heard of Ban Gu's Records of Astronomy,
The Book of Celestial Officials in the Records of the Historian,
Emperor Nian by Huangfu Mi,
and Emperor Ji by Tao Hongjing.
I have never heard of a year name before the Five Periods,
Or a fabricated eon name within the Three Energies.
Since the clear and turbid qi have not yet formed,
It is just the one qi of the Great Pervasion.
How can there be the Primordial Beginning of the Lord Lao, the Five Elders of the Nine Heavens?
Although they have stolen the name of the eon established by the Buddha,
They do not understand the number of formation and destruction.
The Sanskrit word kalpa
means time period.
Although time may be long or short, it is all called a kalpa.
Mistaking the Sanskrit word and confusing the essence and characteristics,
Buddhism had not yet come to this land.
There were only robbers and thieves. According to the Shuowen, it says:
To intimidate people with weapons is called 'robbery'.
Also, the Lu general Cao Mo robbed Duke Huan on the altar, seeking the encroached land.
This is called 'coercion and theft'.
How can there be the word 'åŠ«é‹' (kalpa)?
Now, this statement is falsely appropriated and seen.
The names and positions are already established, and the reign periods are set up.
It is to lead the myriad directions and unify the four seas.
Blending the nine regions into one, with the same carriages and writing.
The Son of Heaven, the most revered, can establish reign periods.
Those without names and positions do not dare to establish them.
Although Confucius edited the books, established the rituals, and distinguished the ruler and ministers,
Without noble status, he was only called the Priestly King.
How much more so for Lao Dan, the pillar historian of the Zhou, listed among the ministers and sons,
Yet arrogantly usurping the emperor's title and falsely establishing reign periods?

How much more so before the Xuanyuan period, when there were no jia and zi stems, and the Yellow Emperor's minister Dayao created the jia and zi stems. In the time of Emperor Wu of the Han dynasty, the reign era names were first established. Emperor Wu began to establish reign era names to mark the ancient times.
How can it be false?
Someone said:
Laozi was born before heaven and earth.
He separately established reign era names.
What contradictions are there?
The answer is:
Since he is above heaven and earth,
he is before the Great Ultimate.
The world has not yet taken form.
There are no traces of ruler and minister.
It is vast and empty, with only one vast expanse.
Who would be ruled by the establishment of reign era names?
It is clear that he stole the adornments of the Buddha,
the meaning of the star-studded kalpa.
And established the names of the clear operations of Yan Kang, Chi Ming, and so on.
They clarify the three times,
while this is about one time.
It is exactly the same as a mountain barbarian stealing the king's clothes,
confused and upside down, with the sequence lost.
You say below:
Laozi was born on Tiangang, and Li Gu's courtesy name was Guangming.
Then he was after the Three Sovereigns.
How could Laojun form the turbid and clear qi to become the primordial chaos and distribute the heaven and earth?
The beginning and end are seen through.
The third and fifth transformations say:
The greatest of all things with form in heaven and earth is the Most High Lord Lao.
He is the ancestor of the primordial chaos,
The parents of heaven and earth.
Therefore, he can distribute the clear and turbid, and open up the heaven and earth.
He operates the three qi of the mysterious origin to form them.
In the heavens, there are the three purities and three realms.ğŸ”½The beginning qi is the realm of jade purity.
The primordial qi is the realm of upper purity.
The mysterious qi is the realm of great purity.
Moreover, the qi of the three purities each produces three qi,
Combining to form nine qi and becoming the nine heavens.
The first is Uttarakuru Heaven.
The second is the heaven of immeasurable life in the upper meditation heaven.
The third is the heaven of Brahmapurohita.
The fourth is the heaven of Paranirmita-vaÅ›avartin.
The fifth is the heaven of ParanirmitavaÅ›avartin.
The sixth is the heaven of ParanirmitavaÅ›avartin.
The seventh is the heaven of ParanirmitavaÅ›avartin.
The eighth is the heaven of ParanirmitavaÅ›avartin.
The ninth is the heaven of ParanirmitavaÅ›avartin.
These nine heavens each give rise to three qi.
Each qi is a heaven.
Combined, there are twenty-seven heavens.
Including these nine heavens, there are thirty-six heavens.
The upper limit of the three realms and four classes of people is the Three Clarities.
This is their number.
The first six heavens below are the desire realm.
One is the heaven of Taihuang.
Two is the heaven of Tai Ming.
Three is the heaven of Qing Ming.
Four is the Xuantai heaven.
Five is the Yuanming heaven.
Six is the Seven Luminaries heaven.
Next, the eighteen heavens are the form realm.
One is the Void and Nothingness heaven.
Two is the Taiji heaven.
Three is the Red Sun heaven.
Four is the Gong Hua heaven.
The five luminaries shine brightly in the heavens.
The six emperors play their flutes in the heavens.
The seven spiritual beings shine brightly in the heavens.
The eight upright and tranquil ones are in the heavens.
The nine primordial bright ones are in the heavens.ğŸ”½The tenth is the extreme jade heavens.
The eleventh is the primordial carriage heavens.
The twelfth is the great peace heavens.
The thirteenth is the extreme wind heavens.
The fourteenth is the first emperor heavens.
The fifteenth is the great yellow heavens.
The sixteenth is the no-thought heavens.
The seventeenth is the ruan music heavens.
The eighteenth is the tamal vows heavens.
Next, the four heavens are the formless realm.
The first is the distant celebration heavens.
The second is the primordial same heavens.
The third is the wondrous accomplishment heavens.
The fourth is the supreme prohibition heavens.
These twenty-eight heavens are called the three realms.
Above this, there are another four heavens called the heavens of the people of the various realms.
The first is the constantly fused heavens.
The second is the jade exalted heavens.
The third is the brahma crossing heavens.
The fourth is the merchant and gambler heavens.
These four heavens transcend the three realms.
It is also said:
The upper three heavens are the realm of the three pure ones.
The first is the Heaven of Great Red.
The second is the Heaven of Yu's Remnant.
The third is the Heaven of Clear Subtlety.
The highest is the Great Luo Heaven.
It encompasses all heavens and is the highest without compare.
The Xuan Capital Jade Capital is located above it.
The Three Honored Ones reside there.
Moreover, the Hidden Writings of the Great Void say:
The Lord of the Great Dao governs in the fifty-fifth layer of the Great Luo Heaven of Ultimate Non-Being, above the Jade Capital.
He is attended by the Seven Treasures, the Xuan Terrace, the Golden Bed, the King's Table, the Golden Boy, and the Jade Girl.
He resides outside the thirty-two heavens and the three realms.
The debate says:ğŸ”½Examine the writings of Fu Xi with a snake body and Yan Di with a bull head.
The classics of Tai Kang with a dragon teacher and Shao Kang with a phoenix record.
The teachings of Zou Yan's discussion of heaven and Huang Liao's discourse on heaven.
The maps of the Earth Classic, the Geography Classic, and the Maps of the Land and Sea.
The Star Classic of the Gan family and Zhang Heng's Spiritual Constitution.
They do not speak of the title of the Three Clarities.
They do not hear of the name of the Great Luo.
They are all based on Buddhist scriptures.
Changing the head and changing the tail.
Selecting other names and forms to embellish their own writings.
Moreover, the origin of the teachings of Daoism started with the Yellow Emperor.
Laozi, Juanzi, Liezi, Zhuangzi, and Yinfu.
It branched off into the teachings of various masters.
None of them talked about heaven.
Only in the Lingbao scriptures compiled by Zhang Daoling.
It began to talk about the thirty-two heavens.
Imitating the Buddhist divine spells, it created secret words.
After that, the Daoist books mutually promoted each other.
The empty branches drew vines, only deceiving the common people.
How is it that Buddhism was not talked about before it came?
Only after the scriptures were widely circulated did it start to sing this name.
Explaining the name.
Cultivating stillness, adding three Zhangs, falsely expounding.
The stealing of dogs and rats is not worthy of value.
The establishment of the four titles in Erya.
Approximating the four seasons.
The nine heavens spoken of in Tai Xuan.
Corresponding to the nine existences.
It is unlike the Daoists' empty addition of numbers.
The heavens have a fixed nature, how can there be few or many?
Now each has different explanations.
It is evident that they are falsely established.
According to Buddhist scriptures, the three realms are moved by the three karmas.
In total there are twenty-eight.
The desire realm has six.
The form realm has eighteen.
The formless realm has four.
Having superior and wonderful desires is called the desire realm.
Having a form that surpasses is called the form realm.
Forgetting both the faculties and consciousness is called the formless realm.
Going beyond this is called leaving birth and death.
After abandoning the segmented body.
Cutting off the name and form, there is no reliance.
How can there be the realm of the mysterious capital, the jade capital mountain, the affairs of golden boys and jade girls mingling, the adornments of jeweled carriages and blue curtains?
The falsehoods and thefts of the unreal are seen here.
I will try to ask the Daoists.
Where do the three realms come from?
What merit is moved by?
They completely do not know how to explain the names and characteristics of the Buddha's teachings.
Moreover, the ultimate achievement of the sect is only to ascend to heaven.
The profound and mysterious of the Numinous Treasure only greedily seeks to transform into a feather-winged immortal.
It is difficult to escape the four characteristics and impossible to avoid the five decays.
Drifting and sinking in the waves of karma.
Following birth and death in cyclic existence.
Even though the karmic consciousness is vast and vast.
Accumulating the source of suffering is vast and vast.
Departing for a long time without returning.
It is truly lamentable.
Uttara RÄmaputra.
Is this not a verification?
The eleventh transformation of the fourth chapter says:
When Laojun was with Fuxi,
He was called the son of Yuhua.
He taught Fuxi the Yuan Yang Jing and teachings.
He described human relationships and drew the eight trigrams.
When he was with Zhu Rong, he was called the son of Guang Shou.
He taught the An Mo Tong Jing.
